content.description: A healer found in the south of **Moongolow**

fields.name: Flames of Moonspell
fields.value:
Permanently remove up to 100 random Golden Egg bonuses. This cannot be undone.
Only shows up if the player has 5,000+ Golden Eggs.

fields.name: Lantern of Foscari
fields.value:
Permanently removes all Golden Egg bonuses on Move Speed. This cannot be undone.
Only shows up if the player has 25,000+ Golden Eggs.

content.title: Purify - Flames of Moonspell / Lantern of Foscari
